2000.name: Dryleaf Whirlwind
2000.caption:
Skill: Dryleaf Whirlwind

This skill represents the pinnacle of Dane's footwork-based martial artistry.
Rise into the air with a series of spinning kicks before crashing down with one final strike. Imbues kicking attacks with energy, increasing their range.

2001.name: Aspects of the Crucible: Wings
2001.caption:
Skill: Aspects of the Crucible: Wings

This skill originates from the lifeforms of the Crucible.
Grow a golden pair of wings and take to the air before diving down at the foe, weapon first. A spinning attack is performed when wielding a twinblade.

4000.name: Spinning Gravity Thrust
4000.caption:
Skill: Spinning Gravity Thrust

A gravity skill honed by the disciples of an Alabaster Lord. Uses gravitational power to hang in the air before rotating the body and charging forward. An additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

4010.name: Palm Blast
4010.caption:
Skill: Palm Blast

Skill of the spiritual seekers known as the Dryleaf Sect. Imbues hand with energy before using a palm strike to unleash an explosive blast. The already formidable power and impact can be bolstered by charging the attack.

4020.name: Piercing Throw
4020.caption:
Skill: Piercing Throw

Throw armament with a powerful spin, causing it to bore through foes. When using this skill, the armament can be thrown further than normal and also pierce through enemies.

4030.name: Scattershot Throw
4030.caption:
Skill: Scattershot Throw

Employ smithing arts to conjure multiple copies of the armament in both hands and throw them all at once. Follow up with an additional input to throw again.

4040.name: Wall of Sparks
4040.caption:
Skill: Wall of Sparks

Scatter perfumed powder in vicinity, producing intense sparks after a brief delay. Can be charged to increase power and range.
The properties of the sparks are determined by the perfume bottle used.

4050.name: Rolling Sparks
4050.caption:
Skill: Rolling Sparks

Scatter perfumed powder before you, triggering rolling explosions of deadly sparks.
The properties of the sparks are determined by the perfume bottle used.

4060.name: Raging Beast
4060.caption:
Skill: Raging Beast

Step with the swiftness of a beast, leap high, and slash foe from above. Initial step can be taken forward, backward, left, or right. Strong attack allows for a follow-up attack.

4070.name: Savage Claws
4070.caption:
Skill: Savage Claws

Pounce like a beast to viciously slash into foe with left and right claws.

4080.name: Red Bear Hunt
4080.caption:
Unique Skill: Red Bear Hunt

Slaughters prey with sharp claws in a great swipe of the arm. The attack creates a vacuum which deals continuous damage. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

4090.name: Blind Spot
4090.caption:
Skill: Blind Spot

Leap into close quarters to take advantage of the enemy's blind spot and gore them from the side. Inputs determine which side you strike from. This attack slips below the opponent's guard.

4100.name: Swift Slash
4100.caption:
Skill: Swift Slash

A skill passed down amongst hornsent swordsmen. Take a swift forward step to slice through foes. This sharp strike also fires off a shearing vacuum. Can be charged to increase the skill's power and the distance of the forward step.

4110.name: Overhead Stance
4110.caption:
Skill: Overhead Stance

A skill that starts with the blade held high in a ready stance.
Execute a normal attack from this stance to step forward and slash downwards, or a strong attack to deliver a series of downward slashes.

4120.name: Wing Stance
4120.caption:
Skill: Wing Stance

Calmly assume a right-sided stance. Normal attack triggers a rapid three-slash combination. Strong attack triggers a leaping thrust.

4130.name: Blinkbolt
4130.caption:
Skill: Blinkbolt

Skill used by the golden knights who served Godwyn. From a low stance, the body is transformed into a bolt of lightning and charges straight ahead at fulgurous speed.

4140.name: Flame Skewer
4140.caption:
Skill: Flame Skewer

Skill of Queelign of the Fire Knights. Enwreathe armament in flame and assume a low stance before skewering the enemy in a single motion. Strong attack unleashes a follow-up flame attack.

4150.name: Savage Lion's Claw
4150.caption:
Skill: Savage Lion's Claw

Skill of the particularly brave, even among the Redmanes. Somersault forwards, striking foes with armament. An additional strike may be performed with an additional input.

4160.name: Divine Beast Frost Stomp
4160.caption:
Skill: Divine Beast Frost Stomp

A skill which imitates the wrath of the divine beast's dance. Lift a leg up high and stamp it down with great force. Sends a powerful wave of frost straight out along the ground. Can be charged to increase power and range.

4170.name: Flame Spear
4170.caption:
Skill: Flame Spear

Skill of Kood, captain of the Fire Knights.
Ready weapon for a thrusting attack and unleash a spear of flame straight ahead. Charge the attack to increase damage dealt and distance travelled.

4180.name: Carian Sovereignty
4180.caption:
Skill: Carian Sovereignty

Skill passed down the Carian royal family. Transform blade into a magical greatsword and bring it down. Additional input follows up with a horizontal sweep. Charge either attack to enhance potency.

4190.name: Shriek of Sorrow
4190.caption:
Skill: Shriek of Sorrow

Skill utilized by the downtrodden. Scream, causing nearby enemies to flinch, while also recalling deep-seated resentment, boosting attack power based on the amount of HP remaining. The lower the HP, the greater the effect.

4200.name: Shield Strike
4200.caption:
Skill: Shield Strike

A skill that uses the shield to attack.
Repeated inputs allow for up to three follow-up attacks.

4210.name: Igon's Drake Hunt
4210.caption:
Skill: Igon's Drake Hunt

Skill of Igon, drake warrior. Ready the bow before unleashing a twisted shot with a great bellow that considerably enhances its power.

4220.name: Ghostflame Call
4220.caption:
Skill: Ghostflame Call

Thrust out armament to summon ghostflame.
Follow up with a normal attack to set the ground ablaze with ghostflame, or a strong attack to trigger a massive explosion.

5000.name: Dragonwound Slash
5000.caption:
Unique Skill: Dragonwound Slash

Designed to hunt colossal dragons, this skill cloaks the armament with a jagged gravel-stone aura before performing a high leaping slash. Charge the attack to also fire off the aura.

5010.name: Needle Piercer
5010.caption:
Unique Skill: Needle Piercer

Skill of Needle Knight Leda. Generates ten gold needles which pierce their target all at once. Those pierced are purged of all ailments and special effects alike.

5020.name: Light
5020.caption:
Unique Skill: Light

Unleashes the light carved in the armament's blade. Send the sword aloft to let loose a blinding light whose many rays sweep through the surrounding area. Also temporarily boosts one's own holy attacks.

5030.name: Darkness
5030.caption:
Unique Skill: Darkness

Raise the sword aloft and cleave surroundings with darkness. Deals holy damage and temporarily reduces holy damage negation.

5040.name: Onze's Line of Stars
5040.caption:
Unique Skill: Onze's Line of Stars

This skill, named after a demi-human swordmaster, imbues sorcerous energy into lined glintstones and executes a slash attack. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks, each dealing greater damage than the last.

5050.name: The Poison Flower Blooms Twice
5050.caption:
Skill: The Poison Flower Blooms Twice

Conjures stingers of scarlet rot from below to stab the enemy. Landing a follow-up attack on a foe already inflicted with poison or rot deals massive damage in one fell swoop.

5080.name: Spinning Guillotine
5080.caption:
Unique Skill: Spinning Guillotine

Hold the putrid blade at both ends and arch body backwards to deliver a powerful overhead chop. Repeated inputs deliver follow-up attacks for as long as stamina allows. Strong attack performs a leap followed by a spinning attack.

5090.name: Unending Dance
5090.caption:
Unique Skill: Unending Dance

A furious dance formed by a succession of slashing attacks. Hold the button down to sustain the dance for as long as stamina allows.

5100.name: Revenger's Blade
5100.caption:
Unique Skill: Revenger's Blade

Dash up to an enemy and slash them open with the blades held in each hand. By holding down the button, the initial dash will be extended. Follow up with strong attack to hack the enemy to pieces.

5110.name: Mists of Eternal Sleep
5110.caption:
Unique Skill: Mists of Eternal Sleep

Releases a velvety purple mist that spreads across a wide frontal area. Afflicts foes with eternal sleep.

5120.name: Dynastic Sickleplay
5120.caption:
Unique Skill: Dynastic Sickleplay

A finessed evasive skill that creates space to maneuver. Inputs dictate direction of the backstep. Follow up with strong attack to perform an advancing upward slash. Press strong attack again to bring the weapon back down.

5130.name: Blinkbolt: Twinaxe
5130.caption:
Unique Skill: Blinkbolt: Twinaxe

From a low stance, the body is transformed into a bolt of lightning and charges straight ahead at fulgurous speed. Strong attack performs a lightning-charged spinning slash.

5140.name: Blinkbolt: Long-hafted Axe
5140.caption:
Unique Skill: Blinkbolt: Long-hafted Axe

From a low stance, the body is transformed into a bolt of lightning and charges straight ahead at fulgurous speed. Strong attack performs a lightning-charged leaping slash.

5150.name: Promised Consort
5150.caption:
Unique Skill: Promised Consort

Imbue the two greatswords with the light of Miquella, then deliver a slashing attack accompanied by columns of light. Additional input allows for up to two follow-up attacks.

5160.name: Shadow Sunflower Headbutt
5160.caption:
Unique Skill: Shadow Sunflower Headbutt

Slam down the blossom of a large shadow sunflower, sending out a shockwave that flattens foes. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

5170.name: Moon-and-Fire Stance
5170.caption:
Unique Skill: Moon-and-Fire Stance

Assume ready stance, swords imbued with magic. Follow up with normal attack to cast glintstone light waves, or strong attack to perform a spinning attack that bathes the area with flame. Light waves can have up to two follow-up casts with additional inputs.

5180.name: Devonia's Vortex
5180.caption:
Unique Skill: Devonia's Vortex

Using the power of the Crucible vortex, violently spin the hammer around and slam the ground, causing a shockwave. This skill can be charged to increase its power.

5190.name: Messmer's Assault
5190.caption:
Unique Skill: Messmer's Assault

A fierce succession of attacks using a flame-coated spear tip. Repeated inputs allow up to two follow-up attacks. The final move thrusts the spear into the ground, causing countless spears to form in the surrounding area.

5210.name: Sleep Evermore
5210.caption:
Unique Skill: Sleep Evermore

Pierces the enemy deeply with a poison-coated needle that delivers eternal sleep. If the follow-up strike lands upon a foe who is already in a state of slumber or eternal sleep, it will deal significant damage.

5220.name: Golden Crux
5220.caption:
Unique Skill: Golden Crux

Leap up and skewer foe from overhead. If successful, the weapon's barbs unfold to excruciate from within; else, additional input releases barbs in the area. There is something of the Golden Order in the sight of those fixed upon this crux.

5230.name: Moore's Charge
5230.caption:
Unique Skill: Moore's Charge

Ready the shield with both hands, then charge forth while maintaining guard, ending in a shove imbued with verdigris magic. Knocks back nearby enemies, but does not cause significant harm. Hold to extend the length of the charge.

5240.name: White Light Charge
5240.caption:
Unique Skill: White Light Charge

Summons white light from the crevice in the weapon's ancient meteoric ore, using its power for a charging attack which pierces foes. Additional input causes the light to explode.

5250.name: Rancor Slash
5250.caption:
Unique Skill: Rancor Slash

Spin around, slashing foes while summoning vengeful spirits which chase down foes. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

5260.name: Witching Hour Slash
5260.caption:
Unique Skill: Witching Hour Slash

Hold the sword level and infuse it with the dark of Night before unleashing a series of incorporeal attacks. This attack cannot be blocked. Can be charged to increase its power.

5270.name: Euporia Vortex
5270.caption:
Unique Skill: Euporia Vortex

Using the power of the vortex, violently twirl the armament, dealing multiple slashes directly ahead. The greater the restored luster of the blades, the greater the power of this skill. However, use of this skill will fully consume the blades' luster.

5280.name: Smithing Art Spears
5280.caption:
Unique Skill: Smithing Art Spears

Slam the red-hot anvil into the ground, sending up countless spears as it is pulled out. The spears disappear instantly.

5290.name: Rancor Slash
5290.caption:
Unique Skill: Rancor Slash

Spin around, slashing foes while summoning vengeful spirits which chase down foes. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

5300.name: Romina's Purification
5300.caption:
Unique Skill: Romina's Purification

Imbues bud-blade with scarlet rot butterflies before unleashing two large sweeping slashes. This was once considered a sacred act of purification.

5310.name: Poison Spear-Hand Strike
5310.caption:
Unique Skill: Poison Spear-Hand Strike

Makes hand into the shape of a spear before unleashing a plunging stab that penetrates the body of the enemy. Afflicts foe with a large dose of deadly poison.

5320.name: Madding Spear-Hand Strike
5320.caption:
Unique Skill: Madding Spear-Hand Strike

Makes hand into the shape of a spear before unleashing a plunging stab that penetrates the body of the enemy. Afflicts foe with a large dose of madness.

5330.name: Feeble Lord's Frenzied Flame
5330.caption:
Unique Skill: Feeble Lord's Frenzied Flame

Hold torch out in front and spit out frenzied flame. Afflicts those caught in its area of effect with madness, along with the user themselves. The skill will continue for as long as the button is held down. Can be used while moving.

5340.name: Repeating Fire
5340.caption:
Unique Skill: Repeating Fire

This skill readies the weapon's rapid-fire mechanism. Once in ready stance, crank the handle to fire bolts in rapid succession.

5350.name: Deadly Dance
5350.caption:
Unique Skill: Deadly Dance

An aggressive spinning skill that tears into foes using the circular blades held in each hand. Additional input allows for a sharp axe-kick follow-up.

5360.name: Fan Shot
5360.caption:
Unique Skill: Fan Shot

This skill uses the bow held horizontally. Readies eight arrows at once, firing them in a fan-shaped arc.

5370.name: Discus Hurl
5370.caption:
Unique Skill: Discus Hurl

Throws the roundshield like a discus. Once thrown, the shield will be instantly restored to the wielder's hand through the smithing arts.

5380.name: Flower Dragonbolt
5380.caption:
Unique Skill: Flower Dragonbolt

Calls down the red lightning of the ancient dragons to strike a target. Deals lightning damage and also temporarily reduces the target's lightning damage negation. Can be charged to increase its power.

5390.name: Kowtower's Resentment
5390.caption:
Unique Skill: Kowtower's Resentment

Skill performed as a violent bow using a finger's foremost protrusion. Resentment builds as it is forced to bow, making it explode with anger. Hold button down to further increase resentment.

5420.name: Painful Strike
5420.caption:
Unique Skill: Painful Strike

A chastening whip strike, honed to maximize pain. Temporarily reduces the rate at which stamina recovers. Thus does the pain encourage obedience.

5430.name: Solitary Moon Slash
5430.caption:
Unique Skill: Solitary Moon Slash

Sharply slash downward using the greatsword, shooting forward an arc of light. Strong attack allows for an advancing follow-up.

5440.name: Revenge of the Night
5440.caption:
Unique Skill: Revenge of the Night

Unleashes the dark of Night imbued with magic power. If used immediately after blocking an incoming attack, its power is absorbed, bolstering the strength of this skill.

5450.name: Weed Cutter
5450.caption:
Unique Skill: Weed Cutter

Performs scythe-like horizontal swings with the sword, cutting men down as if they were weeds. Additional inputs allow for the continuation of the attack for as long as stamina remains.

5460.name: Blindfold of Happiness
5460.caption:
Unique Skill: Blindfold of Happiness

Swing the head while covering the eyes, unleashing a wail of lamentation while temporarily making the user of this skill harder to see. To those who seek happiness, blindness is bliss.

5470.name: Jori's Inquisition
5470.caption:
Unique Skill: Jori's Inquisition

Thrust the greatstaff into the air, firing off a succession of golden barb-like arcs. Holding the button down extends the barrage for a short duration.

5480.name: Roaring Bash
5480.caption:
Unique Skill: Roaring Bash

Roar like a golden lion and deliver a shield bash from a guarding position. Knocks back and staggers foes over a wide radius.

5490.name: Deadly Poison Spray
5490.caption:
Unique Skill: Deadly Poison Spray

Swings the perfume bottle overhead, wafting perfumed powder of deadly poison over a wide area. Poison shall dance upon the air and pour down in quiet calm.

5500.name: Flare, O Serpent
5500.caption:
Unique Skill: Flare, O Serpent

Ignites a flame inside the snakes, temporarily empowering flame attacks. Once ignited, strong attacks and other moves that strike the ground will cause an explosion.

5510.name: Scattershot (Claws)
5510.caption:
Unique Skill: Scattershot (Claws)

Employ smithing arts to conjure multiple copies of the claws in both hands and throw them all at once. Follow up with an additional input to throw again.

5520.name: Hone Blade
5520.caption:
Unique Skill: Hone Blade

Perform a stroking action to sharpen blade, honing its cutting edge and increasing amount of HP recovered. The greater potentates treasure the tools of their practice.

5530.name: Horn Calling
5530.caption:
Unique Skill: Horn Calling

Invokes tangled horns to cover the weapon's blade. Drive the weapon into the ground, calling up a cluster of piercing horns.

5540.name: Horn Calling: Storm
5540.caption:
Unique Skill: Horn Calling: Storm

Invokes tangled horns to cover the weapon's blade. Call a storm into the horns, then mow through enemies. Additional inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

5550.name: Tremendous Phalanx
5550.caption:
Unique Skill: Tremendous Phalanx

Skill of the enchanted troll knights. Creates a defensive arch of enormous magic glintblades overhead, which automatically attack nearby foes. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust.

5560.name: Bloodfiends' Bloodboon
5560.caption:
Unique Skill: Bloodfiends' Bloodboon

Raise the sacred spear and pierce the body of the mother of truth, creating an explosion of bloodflame in the area surrounding the target. Additional input allows for up to three follow-up attacks.

5570.name: Dragonform Flame
5570.caption:
Unique Skill: Dragonform Flame

Spew fire from a dragon-form maw, sweeping in a frontward arc. The flames on the ground will continue to burn for a short time.

5580.name: Lightspeed Slash
5580.caption:
Unique Skill: Lightspeed Slash

Assume a luminous form and leap forward to deliver a downward slash at the speed of light. This attack will be followed up by an additional light attack. Charge to increase power of the skill and number of follow-up attacks.

5600.name: Rancor Shot
5600.caption:
Unique Skill: Rancor Shot

Imbue arrows with vengeful spirits, before firing off a barrage. Imbued arrows chase down foes as they cut through the air.
